timeline.bodyText: I don't see any place where a TryFinallyScopeMap is iterated over.  Did I miss it or is there some other reason this needs to be a LinkedHashMap?
timeline.author: smillst

replies.bodyText: The fields are accessed here and here. In the for loops following each of those lines, extendWithExtendedNode modifies a list that should be in deterministic order.
replies.author: jwaataja
